sentences.en: American forces have begun a big landing.
sentences.cn: 美军已开始大规模登陆。

sentences.en: American humor is founded largely on hyperbole.
sentences.cn: 美式幽默主要以夸张为基础.

sentences.en: Before all this the island was populated by native American Arawaks.
sentences.cn: 在所有这一切发生之前，这个岛上居住的是印第安阿拉瓦克人。

sentences.en: He cautioned that the Russia - American discussions were still in an exploratory stage.
sentences.cn: 他警告说俄美会谈尚处于探索阶段.

sentences.en: He was born of Anglo-American parentage.
I think your South American youth has prejudiced you.
sentences.cn: 我认为你在南美度过的青少年时代让你产生了偏见。

sentences.en: In American football, you have to try to bring down your opponent.
sentences.cn: 在美式橄榄球赛中, 你必须设法把对手弄倒在地.

sentences.en: Most of these workers are American Indians living on reservations.
sentences.cn: 这些工人中的大多数是住在居留地的美洲印第安人.

sentences.en: North American literature is the main theme of this year's festival.
sentences.cn: 北美文学是今年艺术节的主题。

sentences.en: She is the most famous of all American movie queens.
sentences.cn: 她是全美最著名的影后.

sentences.en: The 1990 Nobel Prize for medicine was won by two Americans.
sentences.cn: 两名美国人获得了1990年度诺贝尔医学奖。

sentences.en: The American dollar finished the day up against foreign currencies.
sentences.cn: 美元汇率今日收盘时有所上涨。

sentences.en: The average European kitchen is smaller than its American cousin.
sentences.cn: 欧式的厨房一般比美式厨房小。

sentences.en: This guide book points out the main facts of early American history.
sentences.cn: 这本导游手册讲述了美洲早期的重要史实.

sentences.en: Where can I exchange my American money for foreign money?
sentences.cn: 我在哪儿可以把美元兑换成外币?

sentences.en: You will be paid in American dollars.
sentences.cn: 你的报酬将以美元支付。

phrases.tran_cn: 非裔美国人（指美国黑人）；非裔美籍（等于African American）
美国运通（财富500强公司之一，总部所在地美国）
美国偶像（美国真人秀电视节目）
美国国际集团，美国国际集团公司

trans.tran_cn: 美国的，美洲的，地道美国式的
trans.tran_en: relating to the US or its people

trans.tran_cn: 美国人，美洲人，美国英语

trans.tran_en: relating to the US or its people
